lines: While you are outside, playing alone, a car pulls over to the side of the road and the driver motions for you to come over. You notice the license plate says OBO-237.

The man asks if you know where the school is (it happens to be right around the corner). You tell him where it is. He asks you if you would go there with him and help him locate his ${nephew}, and he mentions the name of one of your
He opens the door on your side. You turn to run away.
He catches you and drags you into the car. You are kidnapped and eventually killed. This game is over.
You run fast, away from the man's car. He doesn't catch you, but if he had, your life would have ended. At home you tell what happened. The police come and ask if you noticed the plate
Correct! The man is wanted for child-molesting and murder in three different states. He is caught and sent to prison.
Once you are in the car he turns away from the school and heads for the highway. This man is very sick. You are kidnapped and eventually killed. This game is over.
He motions for you to come closer. He has a kind enough face. You hear him say that he is a policeman looking for a friend of yours. He asks if you will get in and help him find your friend. You can:
You move away from the man, suspicious that he might not be telling the truth. This is smart. Intellectual sphere rises sharply. This man hurts children.
